Kennedy Warns of Conspiracy (video of audio) - Speech given to American Newspaper Publishers' Association on April 27, 1961. "The very word "secrecy" is repugnant in a free and open society; and we are as a people inherently and historically opposed to secret societies, to secret oaths and to secret proceedings. [...] there is little value in opposing the threat of a closed society by imitating its arbitrary restr
